verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אֶֽל־ <WH413> upon הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <WH5155> upon Nehiloth מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אֲמָרַ֖י <WH561> to my words הַאֲזִ֥ינָה ׀ <WH238> Give ear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD בִּ֣ינָה <WH995> consider הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <WH1901> my meditation

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ <WH7181> Hearken לְק֬וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice שַׁוְעִ֗י <WH7773> of my cry מַלְכִּ֥י <WH4428> my King וֵאלֹהָ֑י <WH430> and my God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <WH6419> for unto thee will I pray

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD בֹּ֭קֶר <WH1242> in the morning תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> shalt thou hear קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> My voice בֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> in the morning אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <WH6186> will I direct לְ֝ךָ֗ וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ <WH6822> [my prayer] unto thee and will look up

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> No אֵֽל־ <WH410> For thou [art] not a God חָפֵ֘ץ <WH2655> that hath pleasure רֶ֥שַׁע ׀ <WH7562> in wickedness אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you לֹ֖א <WH3808> No יְגֻרְךָ֣ <WH1481> dwell רָֽע׃ <WH7451> neither shall evil

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> shall not stand הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <WH1984> The foolish לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH2962> before עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <WH8130> thou hatest כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> all workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

תְּאַבֵּד֮ <WH6> Thou shalt destroy דֹּבְרֵ֪י <WH1696> them that speak כָ֫זָ֥ב <WH3577> leasing אִישׁ־ <WH376> man דָּמִ֥ים <WH1818> the bloody וּמִרְמָ֗ה <WH4820> and deceitful יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב ׀ <WH8581> will abhor יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> by בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> in the multitude חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> of thy mercy אָב֣וֹא <WH935> But as for me I will come בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> [into] thy house אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <WH7812> will I worship אֶל־ <WH413> about הֵֽיכַל־ <WH1964> temple קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> toward thy holy בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3374> [and] in thy fear

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> me O LORD נְחֵ֬נִי <WH5148> Lead בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <WH6666> in thy righteousness לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <WH8324> because of mine enemies [הֹושַׁר כ] (הַיְשַׁ֖ר <WH3474> direct ק) לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> before my face דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH1870> make thy way

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֵ֪ין <WH369> There בְּפִ֡יהוּ <WH6310> in their mouth נְכוֹנָה֮ <WH3559> For [there is] no faithfulness קִרְבָּ֪ם <WH7130> their inward הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <WH1942> part [is] very wickedness קֶֽבֶר־ <WH6913> sepulchre פָּת֥וּחַ <WH6605> [is] an open גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <WH1627> their throat לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> with their tongue יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <WH2505> they flatter

הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם ׀ <WH816> Destroy אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> thou them O God יִפְּלוּ֮ <WH5307> let them fall מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH4156> by their own counsels בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> in the multitude פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <WH6588> of their transgressions הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <WH5080> cast them out כִּי־ <WH3588> for מָ֥רוּ <WH4784> for they have rebelled בָֽךְ׃

וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <WH8055> in thee rejoice כָל־ <WH3605> all ח֪וֹסֵי <WH2620> But let all those that put their trust בָ֡ךְ לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> let them ever יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ <WH7442> shout for joy וְתָסֵ֣ךְ <WH5526> because thou defendest עָלֵ֑ימוֹ <WH5921> and וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ <WH5970> be joyful בְ֝ךָ֗ אֹהֲבֵ֥י <WH157> them let them also that love שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּה֮ <WH859> who תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <WH1288> wilt bless צַ֫דִּ֥יק <WH6662> the righteous יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> For thou LORD כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <WH6793> him as [with] a shield רָצ֥וֹן <WH7522> with favour תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5849> wilt thou compass
